reviews.review: Just been playing  counter strike since it came out ( the old 1 ) so game it self is fun the gun skins are a bonus. some people are nice some are not depending on which i get makes the mood better or worse. so if you like shooter game type id recommend this game
Good game for people starting out with gaming, much better to play with friends than alone.

[ENG] - Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS:GO for short) is an online first-person shooter action game developed by Valve and Hidden Path Entertainment. It works on Microsoft Windows, Mac OS X, PlayStation 3, Xbox, Linux.
